trends: There have been no other sightings in Pljevlja
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsCouple od kids driving in car, age 14-18, at night in village Ravne nort from Pljevlja, Montenegro, where is road in nowhere. Seen red glow sphere, description "looks like sun, but it can't be", emiting red rays all over. Panicked and run away in car. Tommorow they coudn't hold theyr cell phones in hands from fear.
Summary: Looks like red sun, radiating red rays.
